trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor for the collection that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items*> property of the associated <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece um editor de componente para a coleção que é especificada pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items*>propriedade associado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu"> </xref> controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items*>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemCollectionEditor class provides a user interface for editing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem> elements of the collection that is specified by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> property within the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe MenuItemCollectionEditor fornece uma interface do usuário para edição de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>elementos da coleção que é especificado pelo <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A>propriedade dentro associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu.Items%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItem>

trans-unit.source: The MenuItemCollectionEditor is invoked by selecting the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **Items** property in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer, or by choosing **Edit Menu Items** from the **Common Tasks** context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: O MenuItemCollectionEditor é invocado selecionando as reticências (**... **) botão o **itens** propriedade no **propriedades** grade do visual designer, ou escolhendo **editar itens de Menu** do **tarefas comuns** menu de contexto no controle.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A> method edits the values of the menu item collection of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>método edita os valores da coleção de itens de menu do associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor.EditValue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A> method gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>método obtém o estilo de edição que está associado este editor.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor.GetEditStyle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor> class when you select the ellipsis (**…**) button on the **Items** property in the **Properties** grid of the visual designer when designing the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control, or choose **Edit Menu Items** from the **Common Tasks** context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework internamente constrói uma nova instância da classe <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor>quando você seleciona as reticências (**... **) botão o **itens** propriedade no **propriedades** grade do visual designer durante a criação de associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controlar ou escolha **editar itens de Menu** do **tarefas comuns** menu de contexto no controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuItemCollectionEditor>

trans-unit.source: Edits the value of the menu item collection of the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Edita o valor da coleção de itens de menu do controle associado.

trans-unit.source: The EditValue method extracts the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control and the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> object that is associated with that control from the `context` parameter.
trans-unit.target: O método EditValue extrai associado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle e o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>objeto que está associado ao controle do `context` parâmetro.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>

trans-unit.source: Then the EditValue calls back on the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner> to display an editing dialog box that is used to edit the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection> object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> control.
trans-unit.target: O EditValue chama novamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>para exibir uma caixa de diálogo de edição que é usada para editar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu>controle.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.Menu> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MenuItemCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.MenuDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The `provider` parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: O `provider` parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that is used to acquire context information.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que é usada para obter informações de contexto.

trans-unit.source: An object implementing the <xref:System.IServiceProvider> through which editing services can be obtained.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto que implementa o <xref:System.IServiceProvider>por meio do qual edição services pode ser obtido.</xref:System.IServiceProvider>

trans-unit.source: The object to edit the value for.
trans-unit.target: O objeto para editar o valor.

trans-unit.source: The new value; otherwise, if the value of the object has not changed, value unchanged.
trans-unit.target: O novo value ; caso contrário, se o valor do objeto não foi alterado, value inalterado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the editing style that is associated with this editor.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o estilo de edição que está associado este editor.

trans-unit.source: The GetEditStyle method always returns the <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle> value, which indicates that the user interface for the editor is a modal dialog box.
trans-unit.target: O método GetEditStyle sempre retorna o <xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>valor que indica que a interface do usuário para o editor de caixa de diálogo modal.</xref:System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle>

trans-unit.source: The `context` parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: O `context` parâmetro não for usado.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> that indicates the context of the object being edited.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref> que indica o contexto do objeto que está sendo editado.

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Sempre retorna <xref href="System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditorEditStyle"> </xref>.
